site.name: Helal Tech
site.tagline: Innovative Technical Solutions for an Evolving Digital World
site.description: A leading company providing integrated technological solutions and specialized consulting services

hero.title: Innovative Technical Solutions
hero.subtitle: Turning your ideas into digital reality

quality.title: Exceptional Quality
quality.description: We ensure services that meet the highest global quality standards

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly develop creative solutions that meet changing market needs

support.title: Continuous Support
support.description: Our team is ready to help you anytime, anywhere

cta.title: Ready to Develop Your Next Project
cta.description: Let us help you turn your ideas into tangible reality

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Helal Tech was launched with the aim of providing outstanding technological solutions that meet the needs of our customers. We always strive for leadership in the field of technology through a specialized team of experts.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the first technical partner for companies and institutions in the region, and to contribute to supporting digital transformation and building an advanced knowledge economy.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: Providing innovative and high-quality technical solutions that help our customers achieve their goals and develop their business, while adhering to the highest standards of quality and efficiency.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are proud of our distinguished team of experts and specialists in various fields of technology

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Integrated Solutions to Meet Your Needs
services.description: We offer a variety of technical services that help our customers achieve their goals

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Design and develop modern websites that are responsive to all devices

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Develop distinguished applications for smart devices with Android and iOS systems

desktop.title: Desktop Applications
desktop.description: Programming specialized desktop applications that are integrated with enterprise systems

systems.title: Management Systems
systems.description: Building integrated management systems that help automate processes and improve productivity

ai.title: AI Solutions
ai.description: Developing smart applications that take advantage of artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
